position.description: Specifies the position of the model according to the scheme [x, y, z].

rotation.description: Specifies the rotation of the model according to the scheme [x, y, z].

scale.description: Specifies the scale of the model according to the scheme [x, y, z].

position.description: Specifies the position of the model according to the scheme [x, y, z].

rotation.description: Specifies the rotation of the model according to the scheme [x, y, z].

scale.description: Specifies the scale of the model according to the scheme [x, y, z].

category.description: The category for this item. Categories are used to control high level properties of how the item is integrated into the bedrock engine, such as whether it can be used in slash commands.

menu_category.title: Format 1.20.10
menu_category.description: The creative group name and category for this item.

category.description: The Creative Category that this item belongs to. Defaults to "items".

group.description: The Creative Group that this item belongs to. Group name is limited to 256 characters.

is_hidden_in_commands.description: Determines whether or not this item can be used with commands. Commands can use items by default.

is_experimental.description: If this item is experimental, it will only be registered if the world is marked as experimental.

minecraft:damage_absorption.description: Absorbs damage intended for their wearer

minecraft:durability_sensor.description: Emit sounds and particles when damage causes them to lose durability

minecraft:custom_components.title: STABLE (1.21.10)
minecraft:custom_components.description: Sets an ordered list of custom component names which are bound in script to be executed upon an item event.

minecraft:block_placer.title: Format 1.20.10
minecraft:block_placer.description: Planter item component. planter items are items that can be planted.

block.description: block: Set the placement block name for the planter item.

on_use.description: List of block descriptors that contain blocks that this item can be used on. If left empty, all blocks will be allowed.

minecraft:projectile.title: Format 1.20.10
minecraft:projectile.description: Projectile item component. projectile items shoot out, like an arrow.

minimum_critical_power.description: How long you must charge a projectile for it to critically hit.

projectile_entity.description: The entity to be fired as a projectile.

lose_target.description: Specifys if an entity should unselect its target after shooting the projectile

minecraft:record.title: Format 1.20.10
minecraft:record.description: Can place inside a jukebox and play the sound track. Example items: all music discs

duration.description: Duration of sound event in seconds, float value.

comparator_signal.description: Signal strength for comparator blocks to use, from 1 - 13.

use_offhand.description: Can it be used in the offhand.

search_inventory.description: Search the inventory for the item.

use_in_creative.description: Can it be used in creative gamemode.

charge_on_draw.description: Charge on draw. Default is set to false.

launch_power_scale.description: Launch power scale. Default is set to 1.0.

max_draw_duration.description: Draw Duration. Default is set to 0.

max_launch_power.description: Launch power. Default is set to 1.0.

scale_power_by_draw_duration.description: Scale power by draw duration. Default is set to false.

minecraft:throwable.title: Format 1.20.10
minecraft:throwable.description: Throwable item component. Throwable items, such as a snowball.

do_swing_animation.description: Whether the item should use the swing animation when thrown. Default is set to false.

launch_power_scale.description: The scale at which the power of the throw increases. Default is set to 1.0.

max_draw_duration.description: The maximum duration to draw a throwable item. Default is set to 0.0.

max_launch_power.description: The maximum power to launch the throwable item. Default is set to 1.0.

min_draw_duration.description: The minimum duration to draw a throwable item. Default is set to 0.0.

scale_power_by_draw_duration.description: Whether or not the power of the throw increases with duration charged. Default is set to false.

minecraft:can_destroy_in_creative.title: Format 1.20.10
minecraft:can_destroy_in_creative.description: The can destroy in creative component determines if the item will break blocks in creative when swinging.

minecraft:hover_text_color.title: Format 1.20.10
minecraft:hover_text_color.description: The hover text color component determines the color of the item name when hovering over it.

minecraft:repairable.title: Format 1.20.10
minecraft:repairable.description: Repairable item component. Determines the items that can be used to repair this item along with how much durability they repair.

minecraft:cooldown.title: Format 1.20.10
minecraft:cooldown.description: Cool down time for a component. After you use an item it becomes unusable for the duration specified by the 'cool down time' setting in this component.

category.description: The type of cool down for this item.

duration.description: The duration of time this item will spend cooling down before becoming usable again.

minecraft:display_name.title: Format 1.20.0
minecraft:display_name.description: Display Name item component. Determines the text shown whenever an item's name is displayed (ex. hover text).

value.description: Set the display name for an item.

minecraft:durability.title: Format 1.20.0
minecraft:durability.description: Durability item component. Determines how much damage this item takes before breaking and allows the item to be combined in crafting.

max_durability.description: Max durability is the amount of damage that this item can take before breaking.

minecraft:fuel.title: Format 1.20.0
minecraft:fuel.description: Fuel item component. Allows this item to be used as fuel in a furnace to 'cook' other items.

duration.description: How long in seconds will this fuel cook items for.

minecraft:entity_placer.title: Format 1.20.0
minecraft:entity_placer.description: Entity placer item component. You can specifiy allowed blocks that the item is restricted to.

dispense_on.description: List of block descriptors that contain blocks that this item can be dispensed on. If left empty, all blocks will be allowed.

entity.description: The entity to be placed in the world.

use_on.description: List of block descriptors that contain blocks that this item can be used on. If left empty, all blocks will be allowed.

minecraft:icon.title: Format 1.20.0
minecraft:icon.description: Icon item component. Determines the icon to represent the item in the UI and elsewhere.

frame.description: An index or expression for which frame of the icon to display. Default resolves to 0.

legacy_id.description: Legacy texture id for older item icons

texture.description: The key from the resource_pack/textures/item_texture.json 'texture_data' object associated with the texture file Example: blaze_powder

minecraft:max_stack_size.title: Format 1.20.10
minecraft:max_stack_size.description: The max stack size component determines how many of the item can be stacked together.

minecraft:stacked_by_data.title: Format 1.20.20
minecraft:stacked_by_data.description: The stacked by data component determines if the same item with different aux values can stack. Also defines whether the item actors can merge while floating in the world.

minecraft:glint.title: Format 1.20.20
minecraft:glint.description: The glint component determines whether the item has the enchanted glint render effect on it.

minecraft:hand_equipped.title: Format 1.20.20
minecraft:hand_equipped.description: This component determines if an item is rendered like a tool while in hand.

minecraft:use_animation.title: Format 1.20.20
minecraft:use_animation.description: What it will look like while your using the item.

minecraft:allow_off_hand.title: Format 1.20.20
minecraft:allow_off_hand.description: This will allow the item to be held in the offhand slot. Example items; firework rocket, nautilus shell, shield, totem of undying

minecraft:should_despawn.title: Format 1.20.20
minecraft:should_despawn.description: Will the item not naturally despawn. Example item; nether star

minecraft:liquid_clipped.title: Format 1.20.20
minecraft:liquid_clipped.description: Example items; all boats, all spawn eggs

minecraft:damage.title: Format 1.20.20
minecraft:damage.description: The amount of damage the item does.

minecraft:digger.title: Format 1.20.20
minecraft:digger.description: Digger item compoent. Make this item dig up blocks at diffrent speeds.

speed.description: The speed to dig this block. Higher the number the faster it will dig.

use_efficiency.description: Use efficiency enchantment. Default is set to false.

protection.description: How much protection does the armor item have.

slot.description: Slot where you can place the armor piece in/on.

minecraft:food.title: Format 1.20.30
minecraft:food.description: When an item has a food component, it becomes edible to the player.

is_meat.description: If true the item is meat.

can_always_eat.description: If true you can always eat this item (even when not hungry). Default is set to false.

nutrition.description: The value that is added to the actor's nutrition when the item is used. Default is set to 0.

saturation_modifier.description: Saturation Modifier is used in this formula: (nutrition * saturation_modifier * 2) when applying the saturation buff. Default is set to 0.6.

using_converts_to.description: When used, converts to the item specified by the string in this field. Default does not convert item.

item.description: The item that it will become.

minecraft:interact_button.title: Format 1.20.30
minecraft:interact_button.description: This component is a boolean or string that determines if the interact button is shown in touch controls and what text is displayed on the button. When set as true, default "Use Item" text will be used.

minecraft:tags.title: Format 1.20.50
minecraft:tags.description: The tags component determines which tags an item has on it.

tags.description: An array that can contain multiple item tags.

minecraft:use_modifiers.title: Format 1.20.50
minecraft:use_modifiers.description: This component modifies use effects, including how long the item takes to use and the player's speed when used in combination with components like Shooter, Throwable or Food.

movement_modifier.description: Modifier value to scale the players movement speed when item is in use.

use_duration.description: How long the item takes to use in seconds.

minecraft:seed.description: Will place the crop on the block. Similar to block_placer. Example items; carrot, nether_wart, potato, wheat seeds, beetroot seeds, melon seeds, pumpkin seeds, sweet berries

plant_at.description: Blocks that the crop can be placed on. common blocks are; farmland, soul_sand, grass, dirt, podzol

crop_result.description: The name of the crop block to place.

minecraft:shears.description: A shear item. Example item; shears

minecraft:bucket.description: This is a empty bucket item. Example item; bucket

minecraft:carrot_on_a_stick.description: Carrot on a stick item. Example item; carrot on a stick

minecraft:dyeable.description: An item that can be dyed. Example items; leather boots, leather chestplate, firework star, leather helmet, leather horse armor, leather leggings

minecraft:frame_count.description: How many frame the item has. Example items; bow, clock, compass, crossbow, lodestone compass

minecraft:map.description: A map item. Example items; locator map, map

minecraft:mob_spawner_placer.description: This will make the block. Example items; spawn eggs

entity.description: The entity for the spawner to spawn.

block.description: The blocks to apply the spawning functionalty to.

minecraft:item_storage.title: EXPERIMENTAL (toggle: Holiday Creator Features or Caves and Cliffs internal)
minecraft:item_storage.description: The Storage Item Component is used for storing Items within an Item's User Data

capacity.description: The max capacity of the item. default is 64

on_use.description: Event trigger for when the item is used.

on_use_on.description: Event trigger for when the item is used.

movement_modifier.description: Modifier value to scale the players movement speed when item is in use.

on_complete.description: Event trigger for when the item has completed its use duration.

minecraft:weapon.title: Format 1.20.40
minecraft:weapon.description: Weapon Item Component. Added to every weapon item such as axe, sword, trident, bow, crossbow.

on_hit_block.description: Trigger for letting you know when this item is used to hit a block

on_hurt_entity.description: Trigger for letting you know when this item is used to hurt another mob

on_not_hurt_entity.description: Trigger for letting you know when this item hit another actor, but didn't do damage

events.description: A mapping to all events used by this block.
